Has a pleasant fragrance and recommended for all above 3 years.

What a gem from an old and trusted Indian brand. And such great value for money.The fragrance is nice powdery scent which is refreshing without being overpowering. The soap’s cleansing is good, not great. But it has a nice creaminess which is far beyond its modest price. In fact, it has a nice natural creaminess, and not the slipperiness of a Dove. Also, it seems to long last. A clear winner and will be a regular feature on my bathing rack.

I liked the quality of the soap as it wasnt getting too chunky even if it stays wet for most part of the day. BUT, the DEO fragrance in body after taking bath with this soap *** All those are just marketing GIMMICKS. Its got no great fragrance than other soaps and actually its just too minimal. Anyhow the product feels like of good quality.

I really had liked the packing of this soap. But more than that, I remember as soon as I had unpacked it, the surprising fresh smell coming from it was amazing.The soap foam feels soft, rich and white. It moisturizes the skin perfectly. I have an oily skin so I wanted a soap which can balance the skin moisture, not over moisturizing not drying out the skin. And this soap pretty much does that.Also, it lasts for a good time, also most soaps give up their foaming capability as soon as they become small, but this one still gives great lather. Would recommend to everyone.

Nice smelling scented bath soap from Cinthol. The scent lingers for a while even after washing off and leaves the bathroom also smelling great. Besides that it does its job of cleaning as it should. So full points there. Only thing is I was somewhat misguided and ordered a smaller pack when I needed a larger one.
Nice quality product. Great product. Buying all the product from Amazon Pantry regularly.Thank you Amazon for such great quality products at such an affordable rate.

I thought the product might be black or charcoal colour but its a regular white one. The scent is not that great and didnt feel any difference btw normal average soap and this one. I feel the lime one is better than this. Its just a good marketing and nothing else.
I placed order 4+1 soaps.But I have received without seal pack with 4 Nos soaps only. Now how can get remaining soap.
The soap is ok for bathing, no scent at all, more drier. The green one from cinthol is much better.
For a long time I was searching for Indian soap equal to USA Ivory soap or the soap you get in Holiday Inn Hotels. Here it is!!!! Thank you Cinthol!

After blindly using this soap for *years* it suddenly struck me that there is zero cooling effect in this soap now and by now I mean 2-3 years.I started using cinthol cool 6-7 years ago as a kid when I used to think how awesome is this soap (with that tingling cooling after sensation) I felt that this soap is way underrated because of that and the signature smell of it. But now I have realised that the cooling part is ZERO. And the fragrance is bland and doesnt last long.Either this soap is fake because Ive been continuously ordering this soap online in saver pack of 4/5 soaps from Amazon (but the seller being a trusty one at that 🤔) or Godrej has changed the chemical composition of this soap.Either Godrej should bring a "stronger" version of cinthol cool soap or I should look for better alternatives because this soap isnt what it used to be once.

I bought this product because I was experiencing some bad prickly heat and thought the menthol would help. Although I dont feel the minty feeling I was hoping for, I am still well pleased. The scent is very nice and refreshing but not over-bearing like it should only be used by MALES, not medicinal smelling. I dont feel as though my skin is dry and cracking off. And the prickly heat symptoms are gone. I like this product, I will be suggesting it to my friends and family.

ONE OF THE WORST PRODUCTS WHICH I RECEIVED. THIS CINTHOL BATH COOL SOAP HAS NO FRAGRANCE, NO COOL EFFECTS AT ALL. SHOULD NOT PURCHASED BY ANYBODY. THE PACKET IS SHOWING THE DATE IS 01.2020. BUT I THINK IT MUCH MUCH OLDER DUE TO ITS NO FRAGRANCE. I CANNOT RETURN IT BECAUSE I AM TRYING TO USE ONE OF THIS.

In television advertisement, the color of the soap is shown as transparent as glass.But when I bought it, the color of the soap was in blue shade.I had to buy around 5 soaps.This is totally a cheating experience by the manufacturer.Did not expect such a fraud experience.
Decent Soap. Very fresh and nice. Gives good amount of lather. But not the best flavor of Cinthol according to me. I like other flavors better. Cinthol is my fav soap.
Has absolutely no perfume at all... and it is blue in colour not transparent from as it is shown in Cinthol Ad.Total waste

This is not the same product as advertised. I received a Steax Vitariche gloss serum instead of Streax pro Vitagloss as the product name suggests. Called CS to get the refund and since i had closed my bank account since the order was placed i wanted the refund to come through amazon pay. However Amazon rep Aniket and the supervisor Krishna were absolutely unhelpful and went against common sense to keep telling me that the refund will only be processed to the closed bank account and the bank will issue me a DD. When i called them out on their lack of common sense they kept repeating themselves. Finally decided to give away the product than to deal with Amazon for a refund. This shows how base Amazon’s customer service is and a good sign for all to avoid using Amazon if you value your money and time.

No doubt, product is awesome and available at very reasonable price in comparison to other serums and even better than those.But Amazon or Streax, can you tell me how to extract it without its upper cap??Obviously, It may be a fault either by Manufacturing Company or Amazon while packaging.But overall, I am not finding a solution that how to popup serum out of the bottle?

Best serum ....smell is toooo good...I realy liked a lott...just take a small quatity f serum and aply al over the hair before u go fr straighten...as per the description it realy protect the hair from damage...thumbs up fr the product

Minimal effort required to tame frizzy hair with this serum. Hair has nice shiny smooth look and soft to touch. Pleasant scent. Has same good effect on damp hair as well as completely dried hair. Overall thumbs up for this product.

Ive used this serum on my normal hair and chemically straightened hair, as well as seen results on colored hair. And honestly at this price, it never disappointed me. Though the texture is quite thin compared to a lot of other hair serums, but I like how it does not feel heavy on my hair and just a pump of it is enough to dab on my medium length hair. This does the basic job of a hair serum from detangling to providing moisture to the ends of the hair and since it goes a long way, so thumbs up from my side. And to my surprise, the new variant - vitariche gloss is way better than the previous one and this comes with nutty fragrance, which I totally love!

In the package the product did not have a cap as shown in the picture and naturally it was leaking in the box. and I can not be sure of the originality of the same!This item is not returnable by policy, which is understood by nature of the product. But in these cases there should be option to return damaged product. Had bought the item from cloudtail so do expect better experience.
It actually provides a very shiny effect while protecting your hair.And it leaves them with a very pleasant fragrance

I’ve been using this serum for past couple of years and have purchased it for the sixth time recently so was forced to drop a comment automatically. This is the best serum available for the purpose. I’ve got thick hair so before applying wax or blow drying, I need something to protect them and it serves the purpose really well.

Worth its price. Make hair soft and silky and last more than 2 days.The way I discovered this was I had applied this after bath to get ready for a function, it gives a finishing shine to my hairs. Next day as well I don’t need to put extra serum.Amazon delivered this product without any leakage/spills whatsoever... thank you Amazon ans the seller.

Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair.Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family.Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos.Coming to this product let me review as under:Pros:1  Gives good color/highlights if kept for about 45 minutes. (note: 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair).2 The color stays for about 8-9 months and lightens with time.3 After about 1-1.5 months of applying this hair color, I would suggest to use henna/mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs...which will not only nourish your hair, but also give very good result for highlighted hairs.4 Personal tip- If you are not satisfied with colored/highlighted hair and want to remove it, use anti-dandruff shampoo 3-4 times while washing your hair. Also the Godrej hair dye (black) available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights.Cons:1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair. Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results. (note: if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more, I would suggest 3 sachets).2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair.3 Just like any other chemical hair color, it damages you hair and makes your hair rough.Verdict:It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color/highlight your hair at home. I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results.If you find my review helpful, please click the YES/HELPFUL button!

Best hair highlighter!  Loved it. Perfect for brown hair girls!  It stays for a long time. No damage, no dullness or frizzy hair.. The conditioner provided by streax is just awesome.. Makes your hair colour look more glossy and shiny. Smoothed out the hair..
Im looking like tigress.  I love it.

You don’t need to pay extra in salons when u have this. I just love this colour. But if you have long hair then you need two packets of this as such the quantity is less. Other than you can see everything in the picture. I just love the way it turned out.
Very nice product,,, easy too use with gud colout

This color is not for highlighting natural hair. It can highlight only bleached hair. And this kit does not contain blond powder to bleach the hair. It contains only developer and color. I applied it and it didnt give me any visible result on my natural hair, although it can be seen in sunlight. But I didnt get the color I desired.

Did It my on  ends, gives  beautiful  colour  used style 1 n 2 both 1  is brown ( lesser time)  to orangish  if  kept  fr  long and 2  is orange  to golden. U can experience storbing  at home  with  it at cheap  rate with great  results.. Use it  with Britt or simply  wherever u want  with gloved ✋  N it doesnt  damge  hair  just  takecare that  u oil  or  spa  it regularly as lighter hair  tends to look rough.  Go for it ,follow instructions given  for usage..change  ur look  in Mts.

Its a nightmare!!!!!!Trust me, I stuck to each and every direction written on the leaflet, and after almost 2 hours of blonder-shampoo-color-shampoo routine, my entire hair turned orange!!!! That too, not a funky orange. Just the badly-done-henna orange, if you know what I mean.I have tried blue and green and blonde hair color previously, semi+permanent and permanent, but never did I think that a safe color like cappucino brown will turn out to be such a disaster!!!!!!!!Had to order another color just to cover this mess up. Frantically searching for scarfs andhats right now.
Product is good , but the final color is not it must be , it is reddish color

Gurl, dont buy this if you dont want to bleach your hair. My hair used to be a really dark brown, so its black now. Not even a tint of purple. Hair dyes normally dont show up dark hair naturally. You either bleach your hair and lie it die or use a REALLY BRIGHT HAIR DYE AND PRAY FOR THE HAIR LORDS TO BLESS YOUR FACE.

Dont know for how long it will stay colour is nice only if used on properly bleached hair else wont be visible. Streax other items are not that highly priced its reasonable unlike this one. For this tubr 300 is fine.

Absolutely perfect product, delivers exactly as described. No flaws. Very pleasant smell and works like a wonder. Just follow instructions exactly. And do lighten hair with bleach.Advice- do wear gloves as volume will stain skin.Small criticism- bottle had little less product to colour all my hair as I have quite thick and long hair. But can easily get two bottles and it’s perfect
Its a very rich purple. More red hued but does its work.Semi permanentI really disliked its smell.Very strong!

I love the longetivity of this product , this is the only purple I could find out of every semi permanent dyes out there.This is my first time using this product and it turned out really pretty , but I had to bleach my hair twice and it is very important to bleach your hair to level 8 or above (total blonde) ..do not dilute the colour and always take 1:2 ratio of blonder and developer to get the best results

Ive been trying to get purple hair since so long! Wanted to get rid of green hair without bleach washing and directly applied the purple dye over the green hair. I was really surprised when the colour turned out the way I wanted!Really great quality and quantity for 450 rs. Very happy with the purchase! The smell is a bit strong, but pleasant. More red undertones than blue.

The blue came out great! I have dark brown hair and bleached it twice (with volume 30 developer) before applying the colour. Left the colour on for 45-60 minutes. My hair (which felt very rough after bleaching) became much softer after rinsing off the colour. I also used the Crazy Violet (can see it in the pic). Have previously used Manic Panic hair colour which is 4 times the price, and a lot less effective. Would definitely recommend this range from Streax :D
Very vibrant colour and fade away after a monthl , perfect electric blue ,but you have to bleach your hair twice before applying itIt works on atleast level 10 hair

Came out a beautiful colour on my level 9 hair even though I diluted it with conditioner to increase the quantity. Wouldve been stunning if I didnt have to do that! Try to increase the time between washes as you can noticeably see it fade after every wash. Give your hair a blast of cold water after showering to lock the cuticle or the colour will bleed over your neck, clothes, everywhere until it dries.

This made my skin very soft n all the dry patches I had on my face have reduced as this doesnt dry your skin rather hydrate your skin along with cleaning it... Best face wash for people with sensitive n dry skin.

Ive ordered it 3 times and likely to order again. After I moved to Hyderabad I moved to different products like Olay, Ponds, Lotus, Maybelline, Lakme etc. I wasnt happy with any of them. but this Anti aging cream is awesome, in a weeks time I can see and feel the difference in my skin, its very light and light smell. Totally like this cream.

I have ordered this product for my Mom. And she is very happy with the results after using this product.It does works nicely to reduce your wrinkles if you will apply it on daily bases.At least use this twice in a day, if you really want to improve your skin tone.What I liked the most about this product:#####################################Its fragrance is good.Made up with natural ingredients, So it wont harm to your skin.Comes with a very cheaper price if we will  compare to other related brands.JUST go for this product if you are suffering from wrinkle problem.####################################GO for it.Its a value for money product under budget.

I got this for my mom because of the reviews and, to be honest, because of its low price. My mom has been applying it with great dedication every night for over 2 months now (had it ordered 2 times). I can’t say I have seen much of a difference. The least a cream can do is moisturize, but this cream doesn’t work as a moisturizer either. Again, I might be wrong and because my mom has just started using aging creams while she should have started at least some 10 years ago. But, I would really recommend going with better options. And people in the same predicament as mine, can you please suggest me creams that might work?
So nice product, my skin is combination type (oily n dry), it works magically especially in winter. Gives u Extra softness..
My mom changed from ponds day n night cream  after ages and the result is so good.

I was bit skeptical about this cream as I was not sure this is good for my age group or not. After using this for about a week I can say that this one is great cream for anyone who is 25+. Its very moisturising so if you have oily skin like I do, little is more. I love to mix it with few drops of rose water n massage my face for a min or so.

I would like to give five stars. Really amazing work on wrinkles. I am using my third bottle. But apply it on wrinkles before going to sleep. Apply little thicker. You can see the amazing results. Those who are worried about their wrinkles go for it. I got it for 165rs.
This product gives burning sensation, forget removal of wrinkles and ageing signs. I even got red pathes and rashes on face after 3 days of use. M a huge Himalaya fan, but this product is a big NO!!

I love it! Light texture, light scent, excellent results. Keeps you looking youthful, of course wont do miracles, but will slow aging process and I feel it removed expression lines that were starting to show. Ive been using it for quite a while, almost a year, and its the best product Ive tried of its kind. I can use makeup straight on top of it and its fine.

Of all teas which i have tested and tasted, this tea has been my companion since many decades...  with little bit of adrak, pudina leaves, and one little pinch of the powder of cardamon  sticks - but you add milk separately heating it. And see the difference...It is heavenly after a tiring day ... though am not addicted to tea... but have found this particular tea very much enjoyable... and light :-)Thanks .
I tried many other tea brands over the years, however, I have to wait for those tea to finish to get back to getting this Tea. There is no match for this tea. Ive been using this since childhood.

Im a milk-tea addicted person. Although, I control it upto thrice day but sometimes it may exceed 5.Since I like milk-tea alot, I have tried many Dust-teas available in the market.Ive tried and tasted Wagh-bakri, brookebond, Taj, society, maharsthra chai, maa-beti Chai  you name it.I liked the society tea alot. This tea when boiled in the water gives a nice flavor and the color which no other teas can give.The packaging was nice. I ordered for a 1kg pack directly since I already knew about the taste.From the value for money standpoint, it is a little costlier (20-30 Rs per kg)  in comparison to its other teas of its class. But you will find it worth it. Just make sure you use a correct method to prepare to get the best out of it.Method in the sense, first boil it in water and then add milk.Directly adding into milk will also give you the good taste but the colour will fade away in that case.
Received this product in damaged condition and it doesn’t come under returnable category. Since the seal is broken can’t use the product

We are A family of tea drinkers and found it to be the best ever had.Been faithful to Tata tea gold since it got launched but had to buy society tea when our brand was not available during lockdown and found it to be better than Tata tea gold.Where Tata tea gold has longer leaf this one looks like any other tea but once the tea is brewed the colour and taste was as strong as Tata tea gold. Not a percent less.Price was also similar to Tata tea gold. Henceforth we are going to buy whichever brand is on discount online.

Tea above rs. 400 per kg should not contain dust..At the rate 400/-, why to add dust with ctc granules.. Its a 100% margin business, still the company providing sub standard ctc instead of bopsm.. I will not going yo buy it again

Society tea by far is the best brand in terms of taste, colour and flavour. Im using this brand of tea since ages, maybe more than 15 years. Infact I dont buy any other tea except Society. But this time Im not satisfied with my buy as no discounts were offered.
Product is fine. Package had a hole in it  tea powder leaked out.
Society Masala Tea is far better than this one. Pack within expiry but due to storage conditions discolored.

I am using this tea for last 7 year.  Getting this product in bangalore is not easy. Sometime it will be avaialble. Happy to get this product through Amazon.Tea flavour is too good.  After having Society tea, we are not fine in having any other tea :)To get the proper flavour, boil it in water well then add milk.  Sometime i use this tea decoction for hair conditioning also. So pure.

Recently, I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time.  I simply loved it, more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon, cardamom, ginger etc. written on the box.  I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients.  The box says there are added flovors only.  How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different.  I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately, Amazon does not accept return of food items.

Excellent product as its smell,taste and flavour... Every customer who have idea about tea take it without dought ...drink with milk or without milk. Thank you my Amazon and thank you seller... I am very satisfied.

Very good one. Tastes awesome. But the product has come in a plastic water bottle which is free. The plastic is very cheap and the smell of plastic is there in the tea also. Had to empty the contents to a better container. Earlier the container the tea came was very good. This time they have changed it to a water bottle.
The tea is good. But old stock. Packed on October 2016. Best before 12 months of packing. So its already outdated when received.
The tea is great but the delivery charges ruins the whole taste and it feels iy aint orth it. 130 is MRP  120 is Delivery charges which make it double the price, thus not worth it.

This masla tea is best in taste and aroma.I purchased four  different  companies  masala tea to compare the taste .l found test of Society masala  over and above three companies  masala tea.Further a small quantity  of  tea leaves  require to prepare  aromic tasty tea.I am continuously  purchasing this tea now.

When I made my first brew I got impressed by the smell only. The smell was really nice and above all masala was thoroughly mixed within the tea leaves which release its taste and aroma when water boils. Delivery was fine and instead of box I got a very beautiful sipper which made my day.
The which has been sent looks like its a fake product as there are lumps in it ... plus there a foul smell coming out of it please take it back and refund my money
Good but very spicy. Young people will like it but for old/children it is very strong.If mixed with normal tea then better.
Good for the first time use. Later you get irritated due to the spices. May be they should have added more cardamom

When you need just one cup of tea and are too lazy to go through the whole rigmarole, this product is a lifesaver!Just heat water (optionally, add some milk for a richer taste) in a cup in the microwave, then drop in a heaped scoop of this premix. Voila, your tea is ready - no utensils to wash, no gas needed, no tea leaves to throw and no tea filter to clean.Decent in taste, full marks for convenience, this is a must-have in my kitchen.
There are ten sachets in the pack along with measuring cup for 100ml water. You can make one cup tea per sachet. Taste is individuals preference. But I found tea made from Girnars sachets more tasty.

This is perfect for travellers and lazy people only thing u need to do is take hot water mix powder and awesome masala tea is ready(make sure u follow instructions and mix it in right proportion as instructed).Its a must if u are travelling and u cant live without good tea.

I didnt like the taste of it. Too sweet and while I do like sweets, not in my tea. I bought it because I couldnt get my regular one and that this was from Society, and yet I discarded it after just trying it once. So you can imagine how much I hated it. But to each his own. You might like it, who knows. As for me I am never ordering it again.
Nothing special.  Need to mix in a lot of the powder to get a decent tasting cup of tea.
This instant tea is really good. The only thing you need to do is add 1 tsp of milk powder to 1 scoop of tea along with 100 ml hot water. Tastes great and is super refreshing! A must buy!
My favorite premixed Masala Tea... I only wish the policy of limited quantities of this product per customer is removed.
Tried many premixed massala tea earlier.. didnt like them.. This time orded it with doubts.. but really amazed with the product..  Its really my choice of massala tea...
We are regularly using this tea..Best option for early morning busy routines..Just pour hot or warm water and your tea is ready..Purchased several times now..
Best instant teaoutstanding taste masala tea

The original society tea the blue packet is better than this. It has one salty taste that make the tea horrible. No premium quality. Price has increased with deteriorated quality

The tea is really good. Tastes better than wagh bakri premium tea but grain size is much smaller.Leaves a lot of dust at the bottom of the container which is a bit annoying. Every time you finish the container, a lot of tea will be wasted in the form of dust.

We are drinking this tea since years when we are in Mumbai.Only recently started to purchase it on amazon as it isnt available in any stores across Hyderabad.But in few packets the tea is very tiny n does not taste as strong as it should be.

As the pricing was highest for this product in the company range assumed that it would be the best color and flavor.However was disspointed as the flavor is similar to the cheaper leaf tea or even some good dust variety. Also the tea leaves had some foul chemical odour coming, usually teas leaves give a fine frangance.This was prepared with full milk and not black. Not buying this again for sure.

Great taste. Bought it for my parents as they prefer mild teas and it is great for both mild and strong teas. We add a bit more leaves to make it strong. Most teas in Kerala have a flowery taste and they are not good for masala chai. This purchase solved that issue. Its great as a black tea as well. Just dont boil it while making black tea. Boil the leaves only for masala chai.
Good strong flavour, low price. But falsely advertised as "premium Leaf". It is very granular, almost like coffee grounds.Grains smaller than standard CTC, something like Dust Tea.
Very good taste. Feel the rich aroma. Very refreshing. After tasting several brands, found this tea with the premium flavor I was looking for. I will buy only this Society Premium tea moving forward.

The flavous is awesome and packs a punch. Its on the stronger side of the spectrum so those who prefer a lighter flavour should look for something else. The delivery was fast and reacher here a good condition.
Excellent tea very very strong tea previous i used taj mahal tea thats a very very worst product love you society Premium tea

Great taste. Bought it for my parents as they prefer mild teas and it is great for both mild and strong teas. We add a bit more leaves to make it strong. Most teas in Kerala have a flowery taste and they are not good for masala chai. This purchase solved that issue. Its great as a black tea as well. Just dont boil it while making black tea. Boil the leaves only for masala chai.
Good strong flavour, low price. But falsely advertised as "premium Leaf". It is very granular, almost like coffee grounds.Grains smaller than standard CTC, something like Dust Tea.
Very good taste. Feel the rich aroma. Very refreshing. After tasting several brands, found this tea with the premium flavor I was looking for. I will buy only this Society Premium tea moving forward.

The flavous is awesome and packs a punch. Its on the stronger side of the spectrum so those who prefer a lighter flavour should look for something else. The delivery was fast and reacher here a good condition.
Excellent tea very very strong tea previous i used taj mahal tea thats a very very worst product love you society Premium tea

It is strong and tastes very good. After trying almost 10 different brands of tea, I have found the one I like. I have tried Taj Mahal, Red label, RCM and many different others.I like my tea strong and for that you dont have to add too much of this tea. It is not just too strong tea, it tastes good. Most in my family like it and this is the one we are going to use from now on along with Red Label for those who like Red Label more.And Amazon, from time to time, provides good discounts on products and makes them affordable for all. Btw, it sells for 355 next door mall when Amazon is selling it for 385. I know shipping costs, so it is ok.

We in our family have switched from Red Label to Tata Tea Gold now.Red Label is not bad, its just this one is better.This tea is perfect blend of aroma, taste and strong nature of tea. This is perfectly balanced tea between taste and kadak chai.Wagh bakri Tea is too strong with awful taste and Red Label is not so strong but taste good.This one got balanced both of it. So a must buy.

Received d product safe n intact But first time I received the very OLD dated products tea powder 7.5 month older and Ketchup is also 7.5 month older...:(Ketchup is to be used within 1.5 month... that to 1kg I have ordered.. :(sir, before this order I purchased Tata Tea Powder two months ago that product was received with Mfg. date 03/2017...!!! but now I received 2016 Mfg productsLoosing faith on Grocery Order...:(

The quality of the item is not up to the mark. The flavor and the strong test that we (me  my family) found in local shops of ₹10 pack of this tea is missing here.This item is fully useless in case of making liquor tea(red tea). If less liquor is given the tea seems nothing but boiled water  if given more the tea becomes black. I got stuck with this 500gm tea.

I have been using this product for more than three years but I always purchased 500 gm and 250 gm pack but this is the first time that I have purchased 1 kg pack with the expectation that the quality would be same but alas! this 1 kg pack has too much dust tea and very less leaf tea compared to 500 gm or 250 gm pack.Regarding price it is competitive than market price and regarding delivery I would give amazon one star.
Got it on deal arnd @190 rs.

Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky: everyone has their own preferences. Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea.For the purpose of making milk tea,  this particular brand is quite good: a strong combination of good colour, definitely pleasing fragrance and taste thats firm but not too overpowering.This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri. This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider.If youre the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what youre looking for.Its price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many. That said,  if you enjoy that one good cup a day,  its a worthy buy-in.My recommendation: certainly worth a try especially if you like a good,  developed flavour in your cuppa.
Its hard to believe how much they have gone down on the quality aspect compared to what it was 5 years back.
see the product is genuine with latest mfgIt was well packed toothe only griviance is that even after being a prime member I receive the product after a week hope amazon consider that for next time

This tata tea gold is a real gem in the house from tata. In my house we are using this tea since many long long years. And everyone like it. So fellows go for it blindly give it a try and i am really sure with this decision you wont regret it.Ps :  if you guys like very strong tea then go for tata premium this one is little mild, use elaichi, ginger and honey mix it well it adds up the flavour to your tea. I hope this review help you to choose right tea for yourself.

Quality as expected. Most of the people already have used this product. A very good taste. Using for years and no complaints from this product. Also got 15-20% discount on the price. So satisfied.If you liked my review please hit helpful to motivate me to write loyal reviews.
Bought it  for Rs.182 instead of rs.216. all of you know the quality of tata tea very well. If you dont then try this product and you qon

I was using Red label since ages and some time back switched to Tata Gold tea for some reason.I must say Tata gold is way cheaper and tests much batter than Red Label.Also quantity required to make a cup of tea is lesser compared to Red Label.These are my reasons to switch to Tata Gold:  1. Because of the controversial advertising by Red Label where they said that people go to Kumbh Mela to abandon  their old age parents. Thse MNCs come to India, make money from us and than mock us, this should not be tolerated.  2. To support Indian Brands like Tata, Patanjali, Dabur, etc.

One of the best tea from the house of Tata and it is is a beautiful tea having good taste and flavour... actually it is an appropriate mixture of CTC and leaf tea..I ordered this product from Amazon and it was delivered on the next day in a very good packaging... I got it at discounted price...I got the product at 15% discounted price, as I bought the product during Super Value Days.The manufacturing date of product was just 2 and half months ago from date when I received the product in hand. Hence it is recently manufactured product. Also the product have a very good shelf life.Amazon delivered the product in very good condition and packaging of the product was just awesome. No damage. Amazing...The Amazon pantry box are very hard and during packaging they insert air filled sealed packets, so that the items dont move and pressure is absorbed by the air filled packets.Delivery of my order was just the next day morning. The delivery man took the package inside of my house, as it was heavy and kept the pantry box over a table, as I told him. I behavior of the delivery man was good.I am highly satisfied with the product and I recommend you to buy the product without any fear and hesitation. Believe me you will be satisfied after receiving the product and using it.

This tea surprisingly has no taste and flavour, aroma at all. Total waste of money. With 2 spoons for a cup of tea there is no taste at all it feels like we are having just hot water with sugar. It needs 3 spoons for a cup, to atleast get slight taste of tea. I took 500gm pack now its getting difficult to even finish the pack and start with some new tea. I took this tea because my regular brand Wagh Bakri was not available. Such tasteless tea is really not expected from brand Tata.
Looks Like Duplicate, When buy from Near by Grocery Shop, the taste is different.Delivered in Amazon pantry packets taste is very inferior, no aroma and color.

Nothing like Gold. It tastes really unexpected, not worth the price. Dont know what is the hype about.I purchased this Tea pack with GREAT EXPECTATIONS but was disappointed because even when I added two full spoons of tea leaves didnt really got that aroma and taste and not even color.Assuming by the reviews I am reading, It could be a fake product that I received.Will surely try to purchase again and give my valuable feedback.

I think its one of the best available tea in this segment in the market... After all its a TATA product... It has long leaves...Please note that you have to use more quantity as compared to regular tea... I recommend making tea in a closed container on slow/low flame for best results...

If you really a teas fan, you definitely not being unaware of the TATA Tea family. Trusted brand from so many years. I tried almost every standard brand of Teas available in the market, but at last I can say that TATA Tea is the best available brand in the printed price. Although TATA Tea brand is already quite efficient in serving the purpose but the current addition of TATA Tea Gold actually makes sense because of the quality enhancement by adding dried whole tea leaves in to the processed tea. Mixing of whole leaf resulted into the enhanced flavor  color of the prepared Tea. Not more concentrated not milder, it’s like a balanced golden color with real taste/flavor which designed exactly keeping in mind the expectation of the user.1. I agree that if you require strong color/flavor you need to add a little more leaves in to the preparation because TATA Tea Gold is not meant for people who like very strong color seekers. Its more workable for people who wants real flavor with natural golden color in the final preparation. Although even a single tea-spoon is enough to prepare a natural golden cup full of real tea.2. One may keep in mind before using that this tea contains real whole dry tea leaves, so it may take more 2 minutes in preparation in comparison with other brands and the reason is, it is without any added artificial colors into it. The whole dried tea leaves takes time to release real flavor of the contents.3. Taste is premium  up to the expectations as always.4. Packaging is good enough. Visual ergonomic principles well taken into consideration designing the same. Its smarter and visually appealing than the previous packs.I’m using this product from more than 2 years. So, its not an random review. In my family we are using this product in making of every single cup day and night 24x7, whenver we feel like to have one.

I prefer Tata tea to Brooke Bond/Taj Mahal.# Mild taste and fresh aroma# Gives me a soothing effect and relishes# Only small quantity sufficient for making tea# Does not play around with the basic tea taste# Can be consumed with milk or without itThe only issue is with the packaging, I would have preferred plastic box packaging for the price.That would actually help in preserving the aroma and prevent moisture.But, its one of the best tea for everyday use.Cheers :)
Flavour of this tea is goodIt includes little leafs you can see them in itMust try tea

For those who love tea this is a great blend.1. It is a mix of  assam tea and leaf tea - gets you the best of both.2. To enjoy the blend and the tea it should be put in boiling water ( do not boil it post putting tea)3. Let it simmer for some time  3-5 min , and add sugar and milk separately .4. It works out great for the tea lovers and offers a consistent blend all the time.Once you start liking this tea - you will get hooked to it....

I love Tea...  Tata gold tea is one of the best product of Tata...  This it is very useful for daily use...I got this product from Amazon and got a recently manufactured product... The product is a genuine product...There are other variety of Tea available in the market but among those Tata gold tea is is the best tea according to me for daily use...I got the product at 15% discounted price, as I bought the product during Super Value Days.The manufacturing date of product was just 2 and half months ago from date when I received the product in hand. Hence it is recently manufactured product. Also the product have a very good shelf life.Amazon delivered the product in very good condition and packaging of the product was just awesome. No damage. Amazing...The Amazon pantry box are very hard and during packaging they insert air filled sealed packets, so that the items dont move and pressure is absorbed by the air filled packets.Delivery of my order was just the next day morning. The delivery man took the package inside of my house, as it was heavy and kept the pantry box over a table, as I told him. I behavior of the delivery man was good.I am highly satisfied with the product and I recommend you to buy the product without any fear and hesitation. Believe me you will be satisfied after receiving the product and using it.

After using Taj Mahal tea for 20 years, now since the quality of Taj Mahal tea has gone down tremendously, and we have gas and stomach problems after consuming taj mahal tea, we wanted to shift for a better tea. After finding out a lot about different brands, I can assure you This is best tea in India. Always buy this.The taste is awesome, the only drawback is you have to put a lot of tea if youre used to drinking strong tea. Otherwise this is awesome.

Once you see the packing and presentation of the package, one gets positive vibes and expects a lot more than regular tea. ALAS! It is much the same as Agni. Nothing more. Have to use good quantity to prepare good tea.

I am using Tata tea Premium regulary, but bought Tata tea gold just to give it a try to see if its more strong in flavour/aroma or tastes something different. However could not feel much difference rather it is more or less same like Premium tea infact Premium is better..
I have been taking Tata Gold tea since over two decades now. I have tried many cheap and expensive products but Tata Gold is non-replaceable. The new golden color packing is attractive.

I always purchase Tata Agni Leaf tea. Could observe the quality and taste difference a lot this time. Quality not up to the mark. There is much difference between the previous and current tata agni tea purchase. Going forward not going to buy this tea. Waste of money. Not sure if other buyers observed the same.

Tata Tea Agni is good but the quality of this tea have changed a lot previously there was some leaves but nowadays Tata Tea Agni contains only powder tea or dust tea, it gives good liquor but not so much flavour.If you want good liquor along with flavour then you must go for Tata Gold tea that is a good tea. I bought Tata Tea Agni from Amazon at a very low price compared to the MRP and the packaging of the product was really awesome and it was delivered to my home address Durgapur Rana Pratap Road West Bengal within 5 days of ordering.If you want to buy good quality tea with good flavour then you should buy Tata Gold tea, Taj Mahal tea or Darjeeling tea.

Simply put, the tea is flavourful  of good quality for a very cheap price compared to others in the market  also I got the 1kg pack for rs.170 which was manufactured recently. I got 3 packs  all 3 was delivered in great condition.
Good package, it tastes good but  quantity less when compared to red label, but the aroma is nice.... Over all satisfied with the taste....
Tata Agni Tea is value for money. Its MRP is 220/- . Overall good for buy. I recommend to buy this product. Go for cheaper tea.

₹ 200Its a truly good deal for you !Market price per 100 gram is around ₹ 25-30 , but heres ₹ 20 only.Flavor is extremely good and quite strong.It comes specially for milk-tea.If you ask about the packaging quality, I say Amazon very much disappointed me for the first time, they parceled it via a single poly bag, no cardboard box provided which is not expected from Amazon.Luckily I have received my package 100 % good conditions !

Expected better quality tea from a brand like Tata tea. Very low quality tea. Didnt like its flavour and taste. Maybe the tea was very old, expired quality. Its disappointing. Tea quality was not upto Tata tea standard.

Tata Tea Agni is good if youre looking for good less priced option of tea. This tea is not too strong youve to add some large qty to make tea strong. But looking at its price its best. The price is 200/kg which is the lowest in the market. Im using this for last 5 months. Recommended

The display is very big it was not expected.Also functionality wise we have very few options. Also the display is horizontal and perpendicular to the hand which is difficult to view. By the way a I didnt used it for more time time, I returned it on the same day when I received. So I have no comments on on other portions. But I noticed that the steps tracker updates lately. It is not a step by step update, it is updating in its own time intervals which was not expected in this conventional wristbands of todays market.

I got a genuine product with a good packaging and safely handled.I have been using this band since 1 month. I didn’t face any issue with it’s battery life and performance. It has functionalities like distance, heart rate, Calorie, steps tracker Which are accurate and in time too. It displays only call And Whatsapp’s texts notifications ( I have connected my band to iphone so I have no idea if it performs differently when connected to Android smartphones). The battery life is almost 5 days if fully charged once! Sensors inside the watch work finely. This band helps to find the phone if lost. It tracks the sleep time as well which will be displayed on a phone. Hope this was helpful For you.

Pros -Looks goodIndian brandConsThe software is poor.The band and app get updated everyday for bug fixes, but the update never completes.Sleep tracker doesnt work properly - no auto sensor, it depends on manual time feeding for sleep, plus sleep data changes of band firmware update causes sudden change in connection.Call notification does not work. It worked for a couple of calls, but then stopped on its own.Though the sedentary reminder was switched off, the band keeps vibrating every 15 minutes for reminding, even while walking or doing work. It stops only in night mode or when active workout is on.
The heart rate monitor shows as OFF on the tracker whereas visible in the phone.The same value should be visible in the tracker as well as shown in the picture
I have an order, step tracking was not working and in replacement I received an used watch which was not even packed.

Ordered 2 of these and Got 2 defective pieces.Frequent impairing from mobile, discrepancy in sleep / movement tracking and horrible interface.Just bought this product for my parents because they wanted a made in India product but guess what, this product is made in China too! Great work Fastrack (Titan)!Would have given it Zero Stars if I possibly could.

I have to thank the amazon recommendation engine for suggesting the mysore sandal talc. I never knew mysore sandal brand had a talc! I had purchased mysore sandal soap few weeks back and perhaps due to this purchase amazon would have recommended this as well. Glad I clicked the suggestion and bought one of these! Its good bye to my existing Ponds Sandalwood talc !This review compares Mysore sandal talc vis-a-vis Ponds Sandalwood talcPros-1. The Fragrance is the first thing which hits you as soon as you open the bottle. Its smells pure authentic sandal wood than the perfumed ponds talc powder2. The mysore sandal talc allows you to decide the size of the hole you want to have on the bottle. Ponds one forces you to have 3 holes as soon as you want the top cover. I always hated this with the ponds talc. Ponds really wants you to use more than what you need!3. The fragrance last longer than the ponds sandalwood talc even though out the day! Believe it or not - you have to try one and be the judge!4. Some reviews talk about the powder not been finely powdered. Nothing like that - the powder is as fine as its with Ponds sandalwood talc. No more no less!5. The bottle is sealed with a hologram sticker - thats assurance of genuine product from mysore sandal!6. Somehow I like the press-fit top of the bottle to keep the fragrance intact in the bottle when not in use! Ponds bottle was a twist to close top which is not really a seal tight way of shutting close the bottle7. Last but not the least- mysore sandal talc is 50% cheaper than Ponds sandalwood - why on earth would I ever buy Ponds again?Cons-None that i spotted yet

Mysore Sandal is best talc ever in market.. Long-lasting fragrance increase body charm. And I can its Pure natural sandalwood talc. also its very economic talc but no compromise in quality. Go on.....

First time buy, the Talc is okay as its from Mysore Sandal, but still not sure about the scent, longevity and essence of it.Also minimum buy of 2, is not fair  also there wasnt any discount even at the sale time :-( ;-)Well, Amazon, Cloudtail India  Mysore Sandal have done good job, and I believe it will be genuine product!
Just amazing fragrance....original product Delicately perfumed with pure natural sandalwood oil....thanks Amazon for giving me natural product ...Mysore sandal talc is the best talc forever..

Texture is not good, should be finer. Not so cheap either, you can get Nivea 400 gms at same price.Quality also not good, not soft on my skin. Fragrance also not good, guess not a fan of sandalwood after all.

be careful. the image is misleading. it looks like it is offering 3 diff sizes of talcum powder whereas the seller gives only one (large size). if you are expecting to receive all the 3 diff sizes of talcum powder then you are in for a big shock. I think the seller must take note and provide correct product image.

I had ordered 2 of these which arrived on Dec 28 2019. However on opening the seals I noticed an unusual detergent like smell and had no smell like sandalwood oil.  It seems either a fraudulent product has been inserted into the container at the source or maybe this was done by some unethical third party. Wanted to return the items, but being a toiletry product, there is no such option. Very unhappy with the purchase

It has terrific scent. Its not a pinkish or yellowish colour its white colour but we can feel it long n last.I think package Design is changed but Im sure about it, its genuine product.Highly recommended go with this if ur choice is sandal.Because its good brand with half of price than other ponds n santoor.

Nice product, being a govt made product, the quality and genuineness are there.  No stains left in skin after use, whereas Ponds and some other sandal wood powders leave stucky white stain marks. Fragrance is also long lasting.
The best product .. So pure.. Must buy

Its good bye to my existing Ponds Sandalwood talc !This review compares Mysore sandal talc vis-a-vis Ponds Sandalwood talcPros-1. The Fragrance is the first thing which hits you as soon as you open the bottle. Its smells pure authentic sandal wood than the perfumed ponds talc powder2. The mysore sandal talc allows you to decide the size of the hole you want to have on the bottle. Ponds one forces you to have 3 holes as soon as you want the top cover. I always hated this with the ponds talc. Ponds really wants you to use more than what you need!3. The fragrance last longer than the ponds sandalwood talc even though out the day! Believe it or not - you have to try one and be the judge!4. Some reviews talk about the powder not been finely powdered. Nothing like that - the powder is as fine as its with Ponds sandalwood talc. No more no less!5. The bottle is sealed with a hologram sticker - thats assurance of genuine product from mysore sandal!6. Somehow I like the press-fit top of the bottle to keep the fragrance intact in the bottle when not in use! Ponds bottle was a twist to close top which is not really a seal tight way of shutting close the bottle7. Last but not the least- mysore sandal talc is 50% cheaper than Ponds sandalwood - why on earth would I ever buy Ponds again?Cons-None that i spotted yet

Mysore Sandal is best talc ever in market.. Long-lasting fragrance increase body charm. And I can its Pure natural sandalwood talc. also its very economic talc but no compromise in quality. Go on.....

Just amazing fragrance....original product Delicately perfumed with pure natural sandalwood oil....thanks Amazon for giving me natural product ...Mysore sandal talc is the best talc forever..

be careful. the image is misleading. it looks like it is offering 3 diff sizes of talcum powder whereas the seller gives only one (large size). if you are expecting to receive all the 3 diff sizes of talcum powder then you are in for a big shock. I think the seller must take note and provide correct product image.

I had ordered 2 of these which arrived on Dec 28 2019. However on opening the seals I noticed an unusual detergent like smell and had no smell like sandalwood oil. Wanted to return the items, but being a toiletry product, there is no such option. Very unhappy with the purchase

I bought this on a lark and it had been sitting on a shelf for a very long time. Till I developed warts on my chin. No amount of pulling and scrubbing helped and I was reluctant to use over-the-counter wart paint because of all the pharma warnings on them.I decided to use this clay on the warts, covering them with a generous coat of the clay twice a day and kept it on day and night for a month. Voila!I had to be patient but a month of application fixed my skin. Whatever this face pack contains, it is extremely effective. I used to a feel a constant sting after application but it can be ignored. The best part is that it didnt affect healthy skin adversely unlike wart paints which require precautions.Caution - These warts werent because of an STD. I probably picked them up at the gym or some other place with too many people milling around in sweat. Please seek your doctors advice if you have an STD. This face pack should not be applied on your eyelids or where you have a chance of ingesting it. Read disclaimers on the package.
